name: Login & Register Form (Auto Layout)
description:
Input Form for Login and Register Idea.

Works in Light and Dark Mode.


Changelog:

29-04-2022

  • Add Auto Layout
  • Fixed colour palette in dark mode


Login & Register UI Kit is equipped with Web support (design system included) which is 100% editable & customizable. Designs are available in Figma.


Designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. The Design System has been equipped with typography, iconography, color styles, components, elements, buttons, avatars, checkboxes, chips, grids, and many others.


Donate?

Facebook | Instagram


In addition, the application design in figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to edit, delete, or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


Thank you!
